entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -29.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baker Lake Airport 5:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 69 %

Dewpoint: -32.9°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 31. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of light snow. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 49 in the morning and minus 44 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
